name: Little Loki & The Yggdrasil Maze
description:
"Little Loki & The Yggdrasil Maze" is an RPG game produced by sugar*plum and published by Hanabi games.



A hundred years ago, the defeated Demon Lord Loki has now been resurrected! Disregarding the dissuasion of his former subordinates, Loki is determined to reach the Yggdrasil.
Despite Loki possessing the strength of a demon lord, he lost most of his power after resurrection. Faced with formidable enemies, can Loki successfully seek revenge?

This game is a role-playing type of game. Players will control the main character Loki, challenging the maze of theYggdrasil and defeating all encountered enemies. Along the way, they will also meet some companions willing to assist Loki. Help Loki reach the top of the World Tree smoothly!






  • Jrpg
  • Captivating story
